tab1.text1:
Your text could be here.

BTW, you can add as many tabs/links as you want, just follow the syntax... Until it doesnt fit anymore

Checkout the available colors and the syntax you can use to colorize the text for the buttons, titles and general text:

<TextStyle.Red><TextStyle.Red>Red Text</></>
<TextStyle.Green><TextStyle.Green>Green Text</></>
<TextStyle.Blue><TextStyle.Blue>Blue Text</></>
<TextStyle.Yellow><TextStyle.Yellow>Yellow Text</></>
<TextStyle.Orange><TextStyle.Orange>Orange Text</></>
<TextStyle.Violet><TextStyle.Violet>Violet Text</></>
<TextStyle.White><TextStyle.White>White Text</></>
<TextStyle.Black><TextStyle.Black>Black Text</></> < Yes its Black Text on a Black background

tab2.text1: This text goes into the left box
tab2.text2: This text goes into the right box

tab3.text1: This text goes into the left box
tab3.text2: This text goes into the top right box
tab3.text3: This text goes into the bottom right box

tab4.text1: <TextStyle.Orange>This text goes into the top left box</>
tab4.text2: <TextStyle.Violet>This text goes into the top right box</>
tab4.text3: <TextStyle.Red>This text goes into the bottom left box</>
tab4.text4: <TextStyle.White>This text goes into the bottom right box</>
